definitions.definition: try to find something by looking or otherwise seeking carefully and thoroughly.
examples: I searched among the rocks, but there was nothing
synonyms: cast around/about for "I searched for the key in my handbag"

definitions.definition: examine (a place, vehicle, or person) thoroughly in order to find something or someone.
examples: she searched the house from top to bottom
synonyms: go through with a fine-tooth comb; Moreturn upside down
leave no stone unturned in "he searched every room in the house"examine
frisk "the guards searched him for weapons"

definitions.definition: look for information in (a database or the World Wide Web) using a search engine.
examples: search our online archive for stories dating back to February 1996

definitions.definition: an act of searching for someone or something.
examples: the police carried out a thorough search of the premises
synonyms: manhunt "the police continued their search"searching for
in pursuit of "they say they are in search of a silver flask with the monogram 'DLR'"

definitions.definition: an act or instance of searching a database or the World Wide Web.
the systematic retrieval of information, or the facility for this.
an investigation of public records to find if a property is subject to any liabilities or encumbrances.
